item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 9, 2024 at 1:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Mergiraf: a syntax-aware merge driver for Git (62 points | 11 comments)
2. Show HN: HTML-to-Markdown – convert entire websites to Markdown with Golang/CLI (81 points | 20 comments)
3. Delta: A syntax-highlighting pager for Git, diff, grep, and blame output (434 points | 63 comments)
4. Texture-Less Text Rendering (69 points | 26 comments)
5. Mitochondria Are Alive (533 points | 339 comments)
6. SVDQuant: 4-Bit Quantization Powers 12B Flux on a 16GB 4090 GPU with 3x Speedup (65 points | 13 comments)
7. Multiple new macOS sandbox escape vulnerabilities (528 points | 164 comments)
8. In Memory of Stiver (406 points | 46 comments)
9. Can humans say the largest prime number before we find the next one? (200 points | 79 comments)
10. 'Smart' insulin prevents diabetic highs – and deadly lows (94 points | 19 comments)
11. Optimize Database Performance in Ruby on Rails and ActiveRecord (53 points | 23 comments)
12. Obtainium: Get Android App Updates Directly from the Source (42 points | 25 comments)
13. Stabilizing the Obra Dinn 1-bit dithering process (2017) (472 points | 93 comments)
14. A CC-By Open-Source TTS Model with Voice Cloning (74 points | 14 comments)
15. Lynis – Security auditing and hardening tool, for Unix-based systems (10 points | discuss)
16. I quit Google to work for myself (2018) (261 points | 144 comments)
17. Astronauts tight-lipped about reason for hospital visit after 235 days in space (35 points | 24 comments)
18. Segmenting Credit Card Customers with K-Means: A Fun Dive into Clustering (13 points | 5 comments)
19. Maxun: Open-Source No-Code Web Data Extraction Platform (41 points | 3 comments)
20. Making Electronic Calipers (138 points | 48 comments)
21. Cache Directory Tagging Specification (2004) (5 points | discuss)
22. Funding restored for man-page maintenance (73 points | 44 comments)
23. Λ-2D: An Exploration of Drawing as Programming Language (211 points | 52 comments)
24. Show HN: Asterogue, my sci-fi roguelike, is now playable on the web (293 points | 88 comments)
25. Python Logic Simulation Library (75 points | 4 comments)
26. LoRA vs. Full Fine-Tuning: An Illusion of Equivalence (222 points | 49 comments)
27. Money was never the end goal – mrdoob – threejs creator (9 points | 2 comments)
28. My Notes on Apple Math Notes (125 points | 39 comments)
29. Reconstruction of Lomonosov's Discovery of Venus's Atmosphere (2012) [pdf] (17 points | 4 comments)
30. A Random Walk Through Ada (2014) (31 points | 3 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 9, 2024 at 1:15 PM UTC
